name: Segment and Analyze Microbial Cells
description: Segment and analyze microbial cells in microscopy images using image processing techniques
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/segment_and_analyze_microbial_cells.py

fields.name: image_path
fields.description: Path to the microscopy image file

fields.name: output_dir
fields.description: Directory to save output images and results

fields.name: min_cell_size
fields.description: Minimum cell size in pixels to be considered

fields.name: max_cell_size
fields.description: Maximum cell size in pixels to be considered
